channel.title: How do I host my server?
channel.description:
Well I have an edited version of tru3scape's server, and I edited myself, and wish to host for me and a m8 to play around on...
how exactly do I host it where others can log on and play with me?

item.title: How do I host my server?
item.dc:creator: @marc_is_hood marc is hood
item.description:
@marc_is_hood wrote:

use run.bat to run the server.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I host my server?
